scripts.build: npm run build:scripts -s && npm run build:uglyify && npm run build:styles -s && npm run build:markup -s && npm run build:inc
scripts.build:uglyify: uglifyjs  dist/dev-bundle.js -c -o dist/bundle.js && hashmark dist/bundle.js -s -l 8 -m assets.json 'dist/{name}-{hash}{ext}'
scripts.build:scripts: browserify -t coffeeify assets/scripts/main.coffee -d > dist/dev-bundle.js && hashmark dist/dev-bundle.js -s -l 8 -m assets.json 'dist/{name}-{hash}{ext}'
scripts.build:styles: stylus assets/styles/site.styl -m -o dist/ && hashmark -s -l 8 -m assets.json dist/site.css 'dist/{name}-{hash}{ext}'
scripts.dev: npm run watch & npm run serve
